subject: Can you imagine that you are healthy
body:
Dear valued member.
Buy your drugs from the comfort of your home and save up to 20% on pharmaceutical products with MyCanadianPharmacy. 
You can buy Canadian products at prices which are really lower than American products prices without compromising quality. 
Click here and your products will be delivered directly to your doorstephttp://sensedear.hk
Personal approach, high security level, fast and efficient service.Spring discounts are available.
Yours faithfully,Jeffery Holcomb
